summary.para: Defines constants that specify a four-character identifier for a font axis.

remarks.para: You can use the DWRITE_MAKE_FONT_AXIS_TAG(a,b,c,d) macro to create your own custom identifiers. Here's an example.

summary.para: Specifies the weight axis, using the identifier 'w','g','h','t'.
Specifies the width axis, using the identifier 'w','d','t','h'.
Specifies the slant axis, using the identifier 's','l','n','t'.
Specifies the optical size axis, using the identifier 'o','p','s','z'.
Specifies the italic axis, using the identifier 'i','t','a','l'.
